content.query:
ALTER PROC [dbo].[updateBatchdateColumn] @sourcedb NVARCHAR(20),@sourcetable NVARCHAR(20),@batchstartdate DATETIME,@batchenddate DATETIME
AS
BEGIN

UPDATE metatable set batchstarttime = @batchstartdate , batchendtime = @batchenddate where sourcedb = @sourcedb and sourcetable = @sourcetable 

END
